hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.jvdraw.objects

Class GeometricalObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.jvdraw.objects.GeometricalObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleObject, LineObject

    public abstract class GeometricalObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for all geometrical objects that can be defined by two Point objects.
    Author:
    Dan
